name: Volcanic Rune
description: Inscribe a rune of cosmic fire on the earth, which takes 2 seconds to arm and lasts for 15 seconds.  When triggered, the rune blasts all enemies in the target area for 2323 Flame Damage, knocks them into the air, and stuns them for 3 seconds.
effectLines: The rune knocks enemies into the air and stuns them.  Reduces the cost as the ability ranks up.
coefDescription: Inscribe a rune of cosmic fire on the earth, which takes 2 seconds to arm and lasts for 15 seconds.  When triggered, the rune blasts all enemies in the target area for $1 Flame Damage, knocks them into the air, and stuns them for 3 seconds.
rawDescription:
